alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Harding and northeastern Butte Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 3 miles west of Slim Buttes to 8 miles north of Hoover to near Haystack Buttes. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hoover and Sheep Buttes. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
